title: The Magic Books: Fur Magic; Steel Magic; Octagon Magic
description: Contents• Fur Magic • juvenile • [Magic # 3] • (1968)  ♞Cory Adler learns the magic of ancient gods in a land ruled by animals.• Steel Magic • juvenile • [Magic # 1] • (1965)  ⚔Three children travel to an Avalon threatened by evil.• Octagon Magic • juvenile • [Magic # 2] • (1967)  ⚿An old house contains the key to ancient secrets.A trio of fantasy adventures❗
author: Andre Norton
